comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content: This is most likely Edouard Roudil, as mentioned in this NY Times story: ROUDIL DEFEATS BOS AT BILLIARDS; European Champion Loses to French Star in International Tourney.FINAL SCORE, 300 TO 265Winner Comes From Behind to Clinch Victory--Cope MortonLoses to Francis Appleby. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9406EED81E30EE3AB...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We’ll look into it.

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: There is the date Feb 16 1912 printed in mirror writing on the photo, which seems to confirm the match.
